Question: What is a place that usually does not have an elevator and that sometimes has a telephone book?
Options: A. at hotel B. kitchen C. library D. telephone booth E. house

A place that usually does not have an elevator and that sometimes has a telephone book is a library.
A library is a place where people go to read books and do research. It usually does not have an elevator because it is a small building with only one or two floors. A library sometimes has a telephone book because it is a useful reference book for people to look up phone numbers.
A hotel is a place where people go to stay when they are traveling. It usually has an elevator because it is a big building with many floors. A hotel does not have a telephone book because it has a switchboard operator who can connect calls for the guests.
A kitchen is a place where people go to cook food. It usually does not have an elevator because it is a small room in a house. A kitchen does not have a telephone book because it is not a place where people look up phone numbers.
A telephone booth is a small glass room where people go to make phone calls. It usually does not have an elevator because it is a very small space. A telephone booth does not have a telephone book because it has a phone number directory on the wall.
A house is a place where people live. It usually does not have an elevator because it is a small building with only one or two floors. A house sometimes has a telephone book because it is a useful reference book for people to look up phone numbers.
Therefore, the final answer is: C.
